name: Zombieville USA Lite
description:
*****************************
Welcome to Zombieville USA!

When your town is overrun by the walking dead, there's only one thing left to do - go through their pockets and look for loose change! As the lone survivor of a zombie apocalypse, it's up to you to battle legions of the undead in a never ending fight for survival! How long can you hold out? Scrounge for cash and ammunition, and employ a variety of weapons as your inevitable doom closes in around you...

Zombieville USA combines the timeless appeal of classic arcade games with stunning graphics and animation!

LITE VERSION FEATURES:
- A couple levels of light-hearted zombie slaying! Check out the full version of Zombieville USA for the complete survival mode, different difficulty choices, high scores, 15 different weapons/upgrades, multiple zombie types and more!

Be sure to check out the eye-popping trailer at www.zombievilleusa.com!
